title: Trends Detection
subtitle: Analyze political tweets
description: Using NLP and Machine learning algorithms to detect political tweets which become to trends.

title: Video Face Tracker
description: Create a new movie from existing video with at least 3 people. The new video with a face tracker on each person's face.

title: Topic Detection in Images
description: Categorize images generated by the DALL-E 2 algorithm using object detection. After the detection, classify the images into different topics based on the objects detected in each picture.

title: Events Detection in Countries
description:
I selected 4 countries in order to obtain as much information as possible for analysis.
    The main state I have focused on is Mississippi and the other states are Chicago, Connecticut and Georgia.
    The goal is to analyze and describe the sequence of events that took place in the chosen country following the reversal of the ruling of Row v. Wade

title: Analyzing Big Data
description:
The purpose of our research is to try find a correlation between the life events that a certain singer went through, and the information culture he represents and shares with the world. We will make a comparison for each singer between his life events in relation to three different sources of information:
     The singer's lyrics,the pictures of the singer and the tweets he uploads on social networks.

title: Analyze The Activities Of Party
description: The goal is to analyze the activities of the party and the Knesset member over the past year through social networks or articles.

title: Mask Classifier
description: Create an image classifier that can identify if a person in the image wears a facial mask With evaluation of the classifier precision.

title: The Maze
subtitle: Find Dora & Diego
description:
The project was implemented by using the Client-Server model based on multi-threading.

      Written in Java for the back-end side, and JavaFX for the front-end side.

      Implemented by MVVM architecture.

title: Tasty
subtitle: Recipes Web
description:
This site consists of client and server-side. The client can receive recipes randomly, and look for specific recipes.
      Using Client-server architecture. The client-side is written in Vue.js and the server-side is written in Node.js.
      The client-side demonstrates a RESTful architecture to access and use data from the server via HTTP requests.
